title: Linux repquota Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the repquota command in Linux, learn how to retrieve disk quota information for users, and manage disk quota limits for multiple users.

meta.title: Linux repquota Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the repquota command in Linux, learn how to retrieve disk quota information for users, and manage disk quota limits for multiple users.
meta.keywords: Linux, repquota, disk quota, user management, system configuration, storage management

steps.title: Understand the Purpose and Syntax of the repquota Command

verify.name: Verify repquota command usage
verify.hint: The `repquota -u labex` command should display the disk quota information for the `labex` user.

steps.title: Retrieve Disk Quota Information for a Specific User

verify.name: Verify disk quota information for testuser
verify.hint: The `repquota -u testuser` and `repquota -uv testuser` commands should display the correct disk quota information for the `testuser` user.

steps.title: Manage Disk Quota Limits for Multiple Users

verify.name: Verify disk quota limits for multiple users
verify.hint: The `repquota -u user1` and `repquota -u user2` commands should display the correct disk quota limits for `user1` and `user2`.
